name: UnifiedAttribute
description: The unified attribute for the Text Log

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the text log
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the text log
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the text log
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the text log
default: 30.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the text log
default: 30.0

content.name: line_count
content.description:
the number of lines to display within the view space
default: 16

content.name: vertical_line_spacing
content.description:
the amount of vertical space between lines
default: 1.2

content.name: top_padding
content.description:
padding from the top of the text log to the line below
default: 5.0

content.name: bottom_padding
content.description:
padding from the bottom of the text log to the line above
default: 5.0

content.name: left_padding
content.description:
padding from the left of the text log to the lines
default: 5.0

content.name: right_padding
content.description:
padding from the right of the text log to the lines
default: 5.0

content.name: overflow
content.description:
the action to take when lines are longer than what the text log can display
default: WrapOnWord

content.name: addition_direction
content.description:
the direction from which lines are added
default: FromTop

content.name: character_string_style
content.description:
the style of the characters
default: the default value for the CharacterStringUnifiedAttribute type, with the following adjustments
 - inter character spacing: 2.0
